name: market for ferrous metal, in mixed metal scrap | ferrous metal, in mixed metal scrap | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/23612/documentation

This is a market activity, representing a treatment mix. In the case of products needing treatment, market mixes are supplied by the activities treating the product in the geography defined by the market, and they supply the activities needing to treat the product, as they have generated it as a by-product in the Undefined processes (present as a negative input in system models). Transport to the treating facility or losses are also accounted in this type of markets, when relevant.;This is the market for  'ferrous metal, in mixed metal scrap', in the geography of Switzerland.;This market activity represents the transport requirements for the collection of 1 kg of 'ferrous metal, in mixed metal scrap'. Waste tinplate, ferrous metal, and aluminium are collected from households in Switzerland as mixed metal scrap, i.e. jointly as a source-segregated municipal solid waste fraction, for recycling. This activity describes the transport to the sorting facility.

This market activity collects all activities providing treatment for its reference product within the same geography. The physical flow over this market starts at the gate of the activities that produce 'ferrous metal, in mixed metal scrap' within the geography of this dataset, with the product ready for transportation. No losses are considered during the transportation. The activity considers the collection of this waste for the given geography.

A market for a material for treatment (wastes or recyclables) ends with the provision of treatment, i.e. a mix of treatment providers, to activities that generate the reference product as a waste/by-product.
The physical flow over this activity ends with the delivery of 1 kg of 'ferrous metal, in mixed metal scrap' to the activities treating this product. Transport is included.
category: E:Water supply; sewerage, waste management and remediation activities/38:Waste collection, treatment and disposal activities; materials recovery/383:Materials recovery/3830:Materials recovery

processDocumentation.timeDescription: Data mainly reflecting situation in Switzerland in 2012.
processDocumentation.geographyDescription: Data represent the market activities of this product within Switzerland.
processDocumentation.technologyDescription: Average transport requirements to deliver the product to sorting facilities within Switzerland.
